text: Transgender men are men who were assigned female at birth, and now live as men. Discrimination against transgender men includes, but is not limited to: * Not allowing a transgender man to use the male bathroom, regardless of whether they "pass" or not. * Treating transgender men as different from cisgender men in an unnecessary context - for example, in day-to-day life, where being transgender has no relevance. Category:Transgender men
title: Discrimination against transgender men
